metadata.name: #1 MIRROR
metadata.description:
‘AURA’ BY NICK THOMM IS A COLLECTION OF DIGITAL ARTWORKS BACKED BY THEIR CORRESPONDING ORIGINAL PAINTINGS. THE SERIES EXPLORES THE ATMOSPHERE OF COLOR AND IT’S EFFECT ON OUR HUMAN EXPERIENCE.

AT ANY STAGE A HOLDER CAN BURN THEIR NFT TO RECEIVE THE ORIGINAL PAINTING.

EXPIRY FOR BURNING THE NFT IS MARCH 1ST, 2025. AT THIS POINT ANY REMAINING ORIGINAL PAINTINGS WILL BE DESTROYED AND THE NFT WILL BECOME THE FINAL STATE OF THE ARTWORK.

This work does not come with any commercial rights. Copyright © 2022 Nick Thomm Pty Ltd. All Rights Reserved.

Full Details:
https://nickthomm.com/aura
